        Parameters:

                                           int pickedFont)
        Creates a MenuBox that has a button and queue text centered over it
        Parameters:
        btX - The x of the button
        btY - The y of the button
        btW - The width of the button
        btH - The height of the button
        text - The label for the butotn
        btAction - The action the button executes when it's clicked
        pressed - The pressed texture for the button
        unpressed - The unpressed texture for the button
        fontCaches - The font caches to use
        pickedFont - The font to draw with
        Returns:
